name: For Your Tranquility
description:
In 1988, a body of a Frogman has been found dead.

Presumed cause of death: Drowning


In 1988, a dead body was found at a riverside and sent to the morgue for autopsy.
During the autopsy, a lot of irregularities were found on his body.
As you collect evidence at the scene of the crime and find more information...
Who is the real culprit? Why was the victim killed? What was the motive for the murder?


Are you ready to uncover the truth?

“For Your Tranquility” is an investigation game where you become a Medical Examiner and uncover the truth by collecting evidence, performing autopsies, and investigating crime scenes to solve the case.

Collect evidence from the crime scene.

The smallest clue can be the key to solving the case! Even the seemingly trivial might be a key piece of evidence.


Use various pieces of equipment in the autopsy room to collect evidence.

Magnifying glass, cotton swab, tweezers, scalpel to analyze the body and find out the truth.


Case Log

The evidence you find will be logged to the case log. Check the log and solve the crime!

Endings based on your deductions

You have collected a lot of evidence and made your deduction. It is now time to check if you have solved the case.
If your deductions are correct, the truth will be revealed. Otherwise, the case will go unsolved, forever.
